description:
Distance classes

Explanatory notes for the following statistics:
73991 Administrative statistics on aviation tax

Definition:
Countries of destination are categorised into distance
classes depending on the distance between Frankfurt on the
Main, the largest commercial airport in Germany, and the
largest commercial airport in the relevant country of
destination.
There are 3 distance classes.


© Statistisches Bundesamt, Wiesbaden 2017
name: Distance classes
